entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2008/05. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H01: TÁRKI Omnibus 2008/05. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2011-01-10

entry.dcterms:description: The blocks of the TÁRKI 2008/05. omnibus survey: 1; Political attitude. 2; Attitudes towrds the hungarian people and Hungary 3; Assessment of one's own and the country's economic situation 4; NFU indicators 5; Attitudes towards the corruption 6; Navigation systems
entry.dcterms:subject: political institutions, public administration
mass political behavior, attitudes
religion and values
transport, travel (and mobility)
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
